title: Breakfast Mushrooms
ingredients: ['2 large portabello mushrooms', '2 teaspoons finely chopped garlic', '4 tablespoons grated mature Cheddar cheese', '4 tablespoons fresh breadcrumbs', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon steak seasoning', '1 tablespoon bacon flavour bits', '30g butter', '2 eggs, at room temperature', 'salt and pepper']
